languages.text: "Преемственность службы — эффективное благо. Она обеспечивает представителям новых поколений понимание своей функции в механизме".

traits.locale_text: "Преемственность службы — эффективное благо. Она обеспечивает представителям новых поколений понимание своей функции в механизме".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "The succession of service is an effective good. It grants new generations understanding of their function within the mechanism."
languages.original_text: "Преемственность службы — эффективное благо. Она обеспечивает представителям новых поколений понимание своей функции в механизме".

traits.locale_text: "The succession of service is an effective good. It grants new generations understanding of their function within the mechanism."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The succession of service is an effective good. It grants new generations understanding of their function within the mechanism."

traits.locale_text: "The succession of service is an effective good. It grants new generations understanding of their function within the mechanism."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “职责的继承是有好处的，这可以帮助后辈更好地理解他们在整个系统中的功能。”
languages.original_text: "The succession of service is an effective good. It grants new generations understanding of their function within the mechanism."

traits.locale_text: “职责的继承是有好处的，这可以帮助后辈更好地理解他们在整个系统中的功能。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «La sucesión de servicio es un bien eficaz. Permite que las nuevas generaciones comprendan su papel en el mecanismo».
languages.original_text: "The succession of service is an effective good. It grants new generations understanding of their function within the mechanism."

traits.locale_text: «La sucesión de servicio es un bien eficaz. Permite que las nuevas generaciones comprendan su papel en el mecanismo».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「業務内容の継承は良き影響をもたらします。新たな世代が大きな仕組みの中で、自分たちがどのように機能するのか理解することができます」
languages.original_text: "The succession of service is an effective good. It grants new generations understanding of their function within the mechanism."

traits.locale_text: 「業務内容の継承は良き影響をもたらします。新たな世代が大きな仕組みの中で、自分たちがどのように機能するのか理解することができます」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Die Weitergabe einer Position ist effektiv und gut. Sie garantiert, dass neue Generationen ihre Funktion innerhalb des Mechanismus wirklich verstehen."
languages.original_text: "The succession of service is an effective good. It grants new generations understanding of their function within the mechanism."

traits.locale_text: "Die Weitergabe einer Position ist effektiv und gut. Sie garantiert, dass neue Generationen ihre Funktion innerhalb des Mechanismus wirklich verstehen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Ce système de succession est on ne peut plus efficace. Il permet aux nouvelles générations de mieux comprendre leur fonction au sein du mécanisme. »
languages.original_text: "The succession of service is an effective good. It grants new generations understanding of their function within the mechanism."

traits.locale_text: « Ce système de succession est on ne peut plus efficace. Il permet aux nouvelles générations de mieux comprendre leur fonction au sein du mécanisme. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Hizmet halefiyeti, efektif bir yapıdır. Yeni nesillerin mekanizma içindeki fonksiyonlarını anlamalarını sağlar."
languages.original_text: "The succession of service is an effective good. It grants new generations understanding of their function within the mechanism."

traits.locale_text: "Hizmet halefiyeti efektif bir yapıdır. Yeni nesillerin mekanizma içindeki fonksiyonlarını anlamalarını sağlar."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
